feed.title: Google Cloud: App Engine standard environment Ruby
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: App Engine standard environment Ruby

entry.content: Support for the [Ruby 3.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/standard/ruby/runtime) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/#product-launch-stages).
entry.summary: Ruby 3.4 runtime is now in General Availability.
entry.title: Feature: Ruby 3.4 runtime now available
